/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/shark.dir/src/text.cpp.o -o shark   -L/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/freetype/build  -L/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/glew/lib  -L/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/glm/build/glm  -L/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/glfw/build/src  -Wl,-rpath,/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/freetype/build:/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/glew/lib:/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/glm/build/glm:/home/shark/Documents/SharkEditorGL/lib/glfw/build/src -lfreetype -lGLEW -lglm -lglfw3 -lGL -lGLX
